hardcoded_parameters.context: Implements Popperian falsification principle: ONE contradiction -> confidence =
IRRIGATION_HEALTH_WEIGHT = 0.15  # Weight of irrigation health in final score ad
SYSTEMIC_GAP_THRESHOLD = 0.55  # Scores below this indicate gaps
DEFAULT_MICRO_QUESTION_WEIGHT = 1.0  # Default weight for each micro-question
CRITICAL_SCORE_THRESHOLD = 0.4  # Scores below this are considered critical
CV_CONVERGENCE_THRESHOLD = 0.15  # Coefficient of variation for convergence
CV_MODERATE_THRESHOLD = 0.40  # CV threshold for moderate dispersion
CV_HIGH_THRESHOLD = 0.60  # CV threshold for high dispersion
This is the core improvement over the fixed PENALTY_WEIGHT=0.3 approach.
CRITICAL_THRESHOLD = 10000  # >= 10000: no recovery, immediate abort on failure
confidence=0.7,  # Default for raw method output

This is the core improvement over the fixed PENALTY_WEIGHT=0.3 approach.
CRITICAL_SCORE_THRESHOLD = 0.4  # Scores below this are considered critical
CV_CONVERGENCE_THRESHOLD = 0.15  # Coefficient of variation for convergence
CV_MODERATE_THRESHOLD = 0.40  # CV threshold for moderate dispersion
CV_HIGH_THRESHOLD = 0.60  # CV threshold for high dispersion
"formula": "if same_fact detected by multiple methods → confidence = 1 - ∏(1 - c
- Confidence threshold: 0.95 for table detection, 0.90 for sections
BOOST_THRESHOLD = 0.6  # Minimum aggregate quality for boosting
quality_threshold = 0.7  # Default 70% of validations must pass
COMPLEXITY_ADJUSTMENT_THRESHOLD = 0.7  # Threshold for high document complexity
QUALITY_ADJUSTMENT_THRESHOLD = 0.8  # Threshold for high evidence quality
HIGH_PRIORITY_THRESHOLD = 2  # Methods with priority <= 2 always execute
VALIDATION_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD = 0.7  # Execute validation if confidence < this
ANALYSIS_COMPLEXITY_THRESHOLD = 0.6  # Execute analysis if complexity > this
weight = 0.10  # 10% del score total (no tan crítico)
"rationale": f"Audit confidence {confidence:.2f} above all veto thresholds",
